Awaiting Report Item
AR-24-58
REPORT RECEIVED AND ACCEPTED
Mar 17, 2025 5:30 PM

That the City Manager is requested to confer with the Finance Department, Law Department, and other relevant departments to explore the feasibility of a successor program to Rise Up Cambridge.

Information

Department:City Manager's OfficeSponsors:Councillor Sumbul Siddiqui, Vice Mayor Marc C. McGovern, Councillor Ayesha M. Wilson, Councillor Jivan Sobrinho-Wheeler
Category:Awaiting Report
